title: Provides for the permanent disqualification of school bus drivers who fail a random alcohol or drug test in certain cases
summary: Provides for the permanent disqualification of school bus drivers who fail a random alcohol or drug test in certain cases, under the code of federal regulations, where they have previously failed such test or met comparable criteria.
